price: 17. Oh mwana wa ngai! Telemisa losambo mpe tinda (bato) basala bolamu, mpe pekisa mabe, mpe kanga motema na likambo oyo ezui yo. Ya sólo, wana ezali lolenge ya malamu ya kobongisa makambo.
arabic: يَٰبُنَيَّ أَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَأۡمُرۡ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَٱنۡهَ عَنِ ٱلۡمُنكَرِ وَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَصَابَكَۖ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ عَزۡمِ ٱلۡأُمُورِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yābunayya aqimi al-ṣalata wamur bil-maʿrūfi wa-in'ha ʿani al-munkari wa-iṣ'bir ʿalā mā aṣābaka inna dhālika min ʿazmi al-umūri
